```{r}
#| output: false
sapply(
c('data.table', 'bib2df', 'bibtex', 'wordcloud', 'tm', 'stringr', 'pluralize'),
require, character.only = TRUE, quietly = TRUE)

source("./R/utils.R")

tools::bibstyle("thisBib", this.bibstyle() )


b = bibtex::read.bib('./CONTENT/data/publications.bib')

x = bib2df('./CONTENT/data/publications.bib') |> setDT()

x[, bb := format(b, style = "html", .bibstyle = "thisBib") ]

setorder(x, -YEAR, -DATE, JOURNAL)

```

<h1> Publications </h1>

```{r, dev.args=list(bg="#363b42" ) }
#| fig-cap: 'The image is a visual representation of the most frequently used words in the titles of all the publications.'

set.seed(3)

df = char_to_wordcloud(x$TITLE)

wordcloud::wordcloud(
  words        = df$word, 
  freq         = df$freq, 
  max.words    = 150, 
  random.order = FALSE, 
  rot.per      = 0.2, 
  colors       = c("#9A769C", "#AC9CB0", "#C1956E", "#FBFCFC")
  )

```



```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

for(y in unique(x$YEAR) ) {

cat(paste("#", y, '\n\n'))

x[YEAR == y, bb] |> cat()

cat('\n\n')


}

```
